Crate(12 bottles) of expensive booze +-R1000 = 600 trips. If you buy on account have to pay within 30 days. It's normal for a comrade to drink R100 000 per month. Dom Perignon is a lot less than 6000 per bottle. Is there champagne which costs more? Just checked - Dom Perignon 750ml = R2400 Gigaba method of payment. "Usually no more than R200 but I'm WMC So place which can extend R600 000 credit cannot process credit card? Jacob Zuma is an angel Invested same amount in property as he spent on booze in 6 months. """whatever share"" indicates he doesn't know what's in the contract." sham contract "Don't have to be a ""legal person"" to see that it is a dicey contract."
